name: Driver (itch) (RocherSpeedrun)
description:
As he gets in a cab to visit his wife for the last time, Ghislain
is about to find out that his cab drive isn’t « God » but « a god ».
An opportunity for Ghislain to take control of his life by renting
the driver’s services for a few euros and for one night only.

Driver is a 5 minutes school project done by 4 people during 2 weeks at Les Gobelins.
